headline: Primary Tuesday: Dr. Oz in Pennsylvania, Madison Cawthorn in North Carolina, Idaho and more
author: David Jackson
sentences: The Pennsylvania Democrat who is favored to win a Senate nomination but is recovering from a stroke... A North Carolina congressman trying to survive a knockout bid from fellow Republicans... An Idaho governor battling his lieutenant governor... And Donald Trump.
WASHINGTON  The busiest primary day of the year so far arrives Tuesday  with the most volatile cast of characters.
There's the celebrity doctor facing a conservative commentator and a former hedge fund manager in Pennsylvania...
Big primary day features key contests in Pennsylvania, North Carolina, and Oregon.
Oz? and embattled GOP congressman Madison Cawthorn face tough races.
